## Purpose

The purpose of this script is to compare the performance (particularly economic) of stable and unstable countries.   

## Loading the packages and data

```{r Required R Packages, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(readxl)
library(lubridate)
library(psych)
library(Hmisc)
library(PerformanceAnalytics)


```

## Correlation matrix among the variables

First, we need to generate a correlation matrix with significance:

```{r correlation matrix, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
# selecting the variables to be included in the matrix
stabilityDurabilitySFIfsiScores <- select(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, stability, durability, SFI, fsi, GNIperCapita, HDI)
correlationScores <- rcorr(as.matrix(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsiScores))
correlationScores

```


The tables below calculate and plot the correlations among stability, durability, Center of Systemic Peace's SFI and Fund for Peace's fsi:

```{r correlation plots, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE, fig.cap= "Fig. 1.1 - Correlations between Stability, Durabilty, State Fragility Index (SFI), and Fragile State Index (FSI)"}

# Plot with PerformanceAnalytics
chart.Correlation(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsiScores, histogram=TRUE, pch=19)


```

Scaterplot of stability against durability:

```{r Fig. stability against durability, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
ggplot(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, aes(x = stability, y = durability)) +
  geom_point() + geom_hline(yintercept= 95, linetype="dotted", color = "blue", size=1) +
  geom_smooth() + geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "red", size=1)

```

Scaterplot of stability against SFI:

```{r Fig. stability against SFI, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
ggplot(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, aes(x = stability, y = SFI)) +
  geom_point() + geom_hline(yintercept= 16.5, linetype="dotted", color = "blue", size=1) +
  geom_smooth() + geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "red", size=1)

```


Scaterplot of stability against fsi:

```{r Fig. stability against fsi, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
ggplot(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, aes(x = stability, y = fsi)) +
  geom_point() + geom_hline(yintercept= 94, linetype="dotted", color = "red", size=1) +
   geom_smooth() +
  geom_hline(yintercept= 34, linetype="dotted", color = "blue", size=1) +
  geom_vline(xintercept = 0, color = "red", size=1)

```

Scaterplot of SFI against fsi:

```{r Fig. SFI against fsi, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}
ggplot(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, aes(x = SFI, y = fsi)) +
  geom_point() + geom_smooth()
```

Comparison of GNI per Capita between Stable Countries and Unstable Countries: 

```{r Fig. Comparison of GNI per Capita between Stable Countries and Unstable Countries, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}

ggplot(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, aes(x=stabilityCategory2, y=GNIperCapita)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + xlab("stability")



```



Comparison of HDI between Stable Countries and Unstable Countries: 

```{r Fig. Comparison of Human Development Index (HDI) between Stable Countries and Unstable Countries, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}

ggplot(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, aes(x=stabilityCategory2, y=HDI)) + 
  geom_boxplot() + xlab("stability")



```




Comparison of GNI per capita means between Stable Countries and Unstable Countries: 

```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}

group_by(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, stabilityCategory2) %>%
  summarise(
    count = n(),
    mean = mean(GNIperCapita, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd = sd(GNIperCapita, na.rm = TRUE)
  )


```


Comparison of HDI means between Stable Countries and Unstable Countries: 

```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}

group_by(stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, stabilityCategory2) %>%
  summarise(
    count = n(),
    mean = mean(HDI, na.rm = TRUE),
    sd = sd(HDI, na.rm = TRUE)
  )


```


Computing the t.test of independence of GNI per Capita between Stable Countries and Unstable Countries: 

```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}

res <- t.test(GNIperCapita ~ stabilityCategory2, data = stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, var.equal = TRUE)
res

```

Computing the t.test of independence of GNI per Capita between Stable Countries and Unstable Countries: 

```{r, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE, paged.print=FALSE}

res2 <- t.test(HDI ~ stabilityCategory2, data = stabilityDurabilitySFIfsi, var.equal = TRUE)
res2

```
